sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Hi ${requested_by.first_name}

Request ${mail_script:sp_ticket_link}for ${short_description} has been completed our initial test phase.  During this assessment we discovered that there are additional costs which need to be approved. 

These are:

${mail_script:nsr.costs}

This has now been forwarded to your director for approval. Once approved we will setup and test on a test machine before contacting you to install.  If it is rejected you will be notified directly.

You can view the progress of the request by clicking on the request number above or vising the IT Service Portal https://siskgroup.service-now.com/sp

Regards
${assigned_to.name}
Siskgroup IT
sysevent_email_template.name: NSR Costs
sysevent_email_template.subject: Non Standard Request ${Number} is ready for security and compatibility testing
